name: Odd Odyssey
description:
Odyssey is a mind-bending game that explores the duality of dimensions. It's a hard puzzle platformer, where the player goes through an odd "Odyssey". Play the cute, original, but hardcore game now. 

Controls: 
AD + Space - movement 
Shift/Enter - Exit shift mode 
QWEASD - Shift mode
Backspace - Reload Checkpoint 
Escape - Restart Level
